MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the LL49 and LL52 postcode areas of Porthmadog and Criccieth, affecting properties in Penmorfa, Pentrefelin and surrounding areas. This is causing reduced power to a number of properties. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5.10PM. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate the cause of the fault and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 9.00PM. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 7.48PM on 30th March 2021.
